title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, October 16, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of Irish playwright Oscar Wilde (1854-1900), a devoted aesthete and one of the most quotable authors in the English language.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of Irish playwright Oscar Wilde (1854-1900), a devoted aesthete and one of the most quotable authors in the English language.
